Package ch.hepia.devices.device

Interface Device

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoffeeMachine, Printer, StateDevice
public interface Device
Device abstraction that contains a status and a unique ID. A device can be shutdown, started or restarted.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String id()
    Return the device id
    void reboot()
    Simulate a reboot operation.
    void shutdown()
    Simulate a stop operation.
    void start()
    Simulate a start operation.
    Status status()
    Return the current state of the device

  • Method Details

    • id

      java.lang.String id()
      Return the device id
      Returns:
      id du périphérique

    • start

      void start()
      Simulate a start operation. This method must be called only if the device is off
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the device is running

    • shutdown

      void shutdown()
      Simulate a stop operation. This method must be called only if the device is not off
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the device is off

    • reboot

      void reboot()
      Simulate a reboot operation. This method must be called only if the device is not off
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the device is off

    • status

      Status status()
      Return the current state of the device
      Returns:
      the current state
